descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 30 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Traverse vast landscapes of the Green Valley, to uncover all its secrets and build the most prosperous settlement out there! Open world main map filled with interesting places to visit is lively with all the fauna and flora surrounding you. But remember, medieval life can’t be too easy, so be prepared if some obstacles might make your day less peaceful than planned.
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75207238_1802112683933759_9000376894166556511_n.mp4?_nc_cat=101&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=WxdNOhXa7usQ7kNvgF4NP5K&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AABTm_E90p1E2EYsd3Jd00y&oh=00_AYAckw9sz6ve2Dbt4KT4YFr9ZSPzJbY34sysTjonaQrjcA&oe=675B8513)
![{"height":200,"type":"image","width":1500}](https://scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974867_1276229843731356_797379114376682588_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=NFTVw4IK73oQ7kNvgFYcLeH&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDeWmRiZfTfKFdhet3iSik5eMo1cpMtUllFGU_LecWqxg&oe=675B7500)
Hunting, crafting, cooking, farming, beekeeping, alcohol brewing, pottery and many more are all useful skills to learn to survive in a medieval reality, and Medieval Dynasty New Settlement has it all! Discover different ways to stay alive, or simply open up a medieval tavern to treat your clients to home-baked goods.
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39001728_412534815241155_8203139103313802996_n.mp4?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=BBiAQSGwby4Q7kNvgE7_waE&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AABTm_E90p1E2EYsd3Jd00y&oh=00_AYB8ARBiotUAoPvVUTkU5uYh9XUDQO1wDDIoUf5W8AmAcQ&oe=675B81D9)
![{"height":200,"type":"image","width":1500}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035327_905206994409715_1072458557493630835_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=XaTBLVnyv48Q7kNvgFTy0tQ&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDRMq9Tlnpdx1_9QHHkFp-XjMV13MPDwEaWH7oFZfhH8A&oe=675B75DA)
Make yourself at home by creating your own settlement full of useful buildings and various decorations. Collect the necessary resources and watch your place on earth transform into the most advanced settlement in the area! Hire workers to help you with chores and invite them to live on your property to gain a bunch of medieval colleagues! Also, find the love of your life and live to see the birth of your heir!
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/57569449_1017359263499109_8370360938372276483_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=DbegdlR4T7oQ7kNvgGXxjox&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AABTm_E90p1E2EYsd3Jd00y&oh=00_AYCE6PHQWdcdKSf50kM16gmFXB9rk9S1-SDMzeniKHNHng&oe=675B70FA)
![{"height":200,"type":"image","width":1500}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031652_556241980321481_3863248661138929228_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=2znd5BmqpfQQ7kNvgEFk6wt&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYA2yq10L3Qe8Qm2dxYECEfrs623lyLgsR0ktBM1SCt2Hg&oe=675B6F42)
Jump straight into a medieval sandbox, or get to know the Green Valley’s secrets with the adventure mode! Over 20 hours of intriguing story, introducing you step by step to all the mechanics and stories. Befriend your neighbors to help them with their troubles, which will reward you with stuff to develop your own settlement. At the end of the day, it’s up to you how your medieval life will go on!
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39031448_424323233768580_5283543125269031868_n.mp4?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=9R3gd1IF8lkQ7kNvgElpInC&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AABTm_E90p1E2EYsd3Jd00y&oh=00_AYDVvbS7OtIJFA33oHBEuTd2YpEsPZzC86-wcLoRR4ZqTg&oe=675B6520)
